title: pixel 4a 5g - flashlight
content:
Flashlight not working from the dropdown menu. when I am trying to turn the flashlight it blinks for half a sec and there is a message "camera is in use".

the flashlight is working when using it from the camera app.
the flashlight is working from other flashlight apps.

EDIT:
the problem was in a remmaper app, was hooking the camera
